message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, we're extending this exclusive opportunity at a special introductory price of $12,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is quite tight. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,500?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your current budget constraints. In an effort to find a mutually beneficial solution, I am willing to offer the product at $10,000. This still represents a significant discount from our original asking price, while allowing you to secure the benefits of our premium product within your financial limits.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $9,200.

I'm glad you found our proposal appealing, Bob. To further accommodate your budget while ensuring you receive the value you're looking for, I am now offering the product at $9,600. This price reflects a substantial discount from our initial asking price and allows us to bring your cost closer to your budgetary considerations.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. Considering the quality of the product, I would like to propose a final offer of $9,300.

Thank you for your commitment to our product, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I am pleased to confirm our final adjusted price of $9,450. This price not only respects your budgetary constraints but also ensures you receive the value you expect from our premium offering.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget, Alice. Considering the product's value, I would like to propose a final offer of $9,350.

I'm grateful for your persistence, Bob. In response to your final offer, I am delighted to confirm our final adjusted price of $9,400. This price strikes a balance between respecting your budget and ensuring you receive the high-quality product you deserve.
Thank you for your consideration, Alice. After reviewing the product again, I would like to make one last offer of $9,300.
